data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Isiolo, Kenya.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Isiolo, Kenya
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Isiolo to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Isiolo, Kenya the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Isiolo, Kenya to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Ilchamus people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Ilchamus people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Ilchamus people is yours.
Jesus, please help the 71,083 believers in the state of Isiolo to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Isiolo, Kenya. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Isiolo, Kenya know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

location.name: Isiolo
location.people_groups_list: El Molo, Mukogodo, Yaaku, Waata, Samburu
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: El Molo (3,700), Mukogodo, Yaaku (4,500), Waata (16,000), Samburu (310,000)
